title: What's pxlNav?What?
description:
The background of this page is running 'pxlNav',
       A javascript package to extend Three.

media.alt: Showing The Outlet environment in Houdini
media.caption: Using Houdini as my level editor for The Outlet

media.alt: Showing User Details in different CGI programs
media.caption: Add custom User Details to objects in your 3d modeling software, Allowing pxlNav to better understand your FBX file.
